contents:
340 BREAKING: Rep. Chip Roy announces the "Pause Act", a bill that freezes all immigration until H1-B is ended, chain migration is reformed, and birthright citizenship is dealt with: 

"The H1-B system is broken. I've got a bill I'm introducing this week or next that is a freeze on all immigration posted 15 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 19 comments award share report block Benny Johnson @bennyjohnson • 19h BREAKING: Rep. Chip Roy announces the "Pause Act", a bill that freezes all immigration until H1-B is ended, chain migration is reformed, and birthright citizenship is dealt with: "The H1-B system is broken. I've got a bill I'm introducing this week or next that is a freeze on
